title: Sketchbook Folio, Sketchbook Page: Ceiling and Architectural Details, Tempio Malatestiano, Rimini, 1810–20
title_raw: Sketchbook Page: Ceiling and Architectural Details, Tempio Malatestiano, Rimini
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: 1; at lower right: monuo/ di Leone/ Batista/ Alberti/ Rimini. On Verso at lower right: monumento del/ trecento Roma
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Upper section of drawing of coffered ceiling with decorations of garlands, grotesques, trophies, and one figurative roundel. Belowan architrave with moldings, top of shell-niche with head, and corinthian capital.  At lower right, winged putto holding shield.  Putto, shell niche, and capital from Capella di Sigismondo, Tempio Malatestiano.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, Sketchbook Page: Ceiling and Architectural Details, Tempio Malatestiano, Rimini, 1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3485
